name: series_markup
description: Series-level segmentation and annotation in 3D Slicer
label: Series Markup
slicer_script:
s = SlicerHelper(working_folder)
s.load_study_from_pacs(study_uid)
seg = s.create_segmentation('markup')
s.setup_editor(seg, effect='Paint', brush_size=20)
s.set_layout('axial')
